title: God Bless Football: Freeney, Babers, Reich and Carl Douglas
description:
Chris Simms realizes Billy, Stugotz and Mikey A. don't regularly watch him on tv when they compliment his outfit. Syracuse alum, Dwight Freeney, joins the show to talk to Dino Babers about this weekend's big game between #18 Syracuse and #14 NC State and for the guys to try to get coach to agree to retire his number. Stugotz makes his weekly college and pro picks. Frank Reich is back to to preview Colts vs. Jags and to see if the show is actually cursed. After an 0-4 week Mojo is replaced by Carl Douglas to make picks with Joba, Chris and K-Funk.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
